A peace sign with flowers woven around it, symbolizing the beauty of peaceful coexistence and the growth that comes from unity.
A pair of wings with an open book in the center, representing the power of knowledge and understanding in bringing about peace.
A person sitting on a chair with the word "Peace" written on it, signifying the importance of inner tranquility in leading to world peace.
A tree with a heart on its trunk and two branches extending outward, symbolizing love and unity.
A dove in a wheelchair riding a skateboard, representing the power of people with diverse abilities to come together in peace.
